select c.cafe_id, c.cafe_name, c.cafe_addr1, c.cafe_addr2, c.post_code, c.open_time, c.close_time, c.cafe_img_name1, c.cafe_img_path1, c.cafe_img_name2, c.cafe_img_path2, c.cafe_content1, c.cafe_content2, c.cafe_content3, c.cafe_oneline, c.cafe_category, room_id, r.max_people, r.price_hour, r.room_name
from cafe c, room r
where c.cafe_id = #{cafe_id} and c.cafe_id = r.cafe_id
order by r.room_name limit 1

select cafe_id, cafe_name, post_code, cafe_addr1, cafe_addr2, open_time, close_time, cafe_img_name1, cafe_img_path1, cafe_img_name2, cafe_img_path2, cafe_content1, cafe_content2, cafe_content3, cafe_category, cafe_oneline from cafe
and cafe_category = #{cafe_category}
and cafe_addr2 like concat('%', #{cafe_addr2}, '%')
order by cafe_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into cafe (cafe_name, post_code, cafe_addr1, cafe_addr2, open_time, close_time, cafe_img_name1, cafe_img_path1, cafe_img_name2, cafe_img_path2, cafe_content1, cafe_content2, cafe_content3, cafe_category, cafe_oneline ) values (#{cafe_name}, #{post_code}, #{cafe_addr1}, #{cafe_addr2}, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{cafe_img_name1}, #{cafe_img_path1}, #{cafe_img_name2}, #{cafe_img_path2}, #{cafe_content1}, #{cafe_content2}, #{cafe_content3}, #{cafe_category}, #{cafe_oneline} )
insert into room (cafe_id, max_people, price_hour, room_name) values (#{cafe_id}, #{max_people}, #{price_hour}, #{room_name})
